page.title: 18 LOCAL INTERESTS 2
page.content: ...old barn at Corks Farm have applied for planning permission to convert it into a single large dwelling. The big timber barn is one of a group of buildings at the farm which are no longer needed for agriculture the trust has come up with the following two ideas; 1) To convert it into a family home 2) To make it into a smaller home / workshop for a craftsman to live and work in.The Trust have said that they believe their design would preserve the outstanding qualities of the barn and enhance the overall group of buildings. They are also concerned about the large number of barns in the area which have fallen into disuse owing to modernised methods of farming, as they feel that many of these buildings are excellent examples of architecture and should be preserved.
